poem.title: Dreg
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Routine - a tree of lemons with no zest, A boarding-house of widowers in cotton vest And trousers missing buttons at the waist: Peely-wally, slovenly, ascetic; Otherwise real fruit made to look like wax, Ascorbic sliver of silicone and dieldrin in your gin Kennst du das Land, wo die Zitronen blühn? And people vote for Silvio Berlusconi.
